org.apache.oodt.grid

Class ProfileQueryServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • org.apache.oodt.grid.GridServlet
          • org.apache.oodt.grid.QueryServlet
            • org.apache.oodt.grid.ProfileQueryServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class ProfileQueryServlet
extends QueryServlet
    Profile query servlet handles profile queries. It returns every matching profile from every query handler that provides matching profiles. If no handlers are installed, then it returns an empty <profiles> document.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getServers

        protected List getServers(Configuration config)
        Get a list of Servers that will provide handlers to handle the query. Subclasses implement this by returning a list of either ProductServers or ProfileServers.
        Specified by:
        getServers in class QueryServlet
        Parameters:
        config - a Configuration value.
        Returns:
        a List value of Servers of some kind.

      • handleQuery

        protected void handleQuery(XMLQuery query,
                           List handlers,
                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse res)
                    throws IOException
        Handle the query. Subclasses implement this by parsing the query and returning some results.
        Specified by:
        handleQuery in class QueryServlet
        Parameters:
        query - The query to handle.
        handlers - A list of either product QueryHandlers or profile ProfileHandlers.
        req - a HttpServletRequest value.
        res - a HttpServletResponse value.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
